title: Nominations for Australia Day Awards 2021

pars: If you know of an outstanding achiever in our Rushworth and District community, who deserves recognition, whether it be for charity work, volunteering, commitment to sport, seniors’ programs, the arts or community services generally, please take the time to nominate them for the 2021 Australia Day Awards.
Even if Australia Day is not celebrated due to COVID, awards will still be given out.
Nominations are open in two Categories only:

• Citizen of the Year (must be 25 years or older)
  • Young Citizen of the Year (must be between 15 and 25 yrs)

Forms for Australia Day Awards can be filled out on Shire of Campaspe website www.campaspe.vic.gov.au or alternatively, hard copies are available from Rushworth Customer Service Centre, open Tuesday and Friday.
If not completed online, copies must be submitted to local Australia Day committee members -
Owing to COVID the committee have not been able to hold meetings, however, continuing to work behind the scenes.

abstract:
If you know of an outstanding achiever in our Rushworth and District community, who deserves recognition, whether it be for charity
work, volunteering, commitment to sport, seniors’ programs, the arts or community services generally, please take the time to nominate
them for the 2021 Australia Day Awards.
